title: Longsword

fields.name: - Flipped ( <:weapon:1107519313075785768> + <:pink:1106716301843497030> ):
fields.value:
Everyone else draws 1 card.
- You have unlimited range and spread with card effects and may apply **Plus 1** to 2 cards.

desc:
Post 2340
- Unflipped: 1 person of your choice draws a card.
- From now on, you have unlimited range with the effects of cards and can spread them out however you want.
